title: FridaBaby Control The Flow Polypropylene ABS Rinser|Bath Time Rinse Cup with Easy Grip Handle and Removable Rain Shower
description: Rinse the day off of your little one with the Control The Flow Rinser cup. This dual flow rinse cup features a soft rain shower spout that's gentle enough for newborns, and a waterfall spout to rinse off toddlers. The soft pitcher directs the flow of water out of their eyes and ears for a painless tub experience.
